	at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:113)

*** Bug 96539 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The problem is due to the difference in datacollection RAC plugin names in 3.3
and 4.0.  In 3.3, it's "org.eclipse.hyades.datacollection" and
"org.eclipse.tptp.platform.collection.framework" in 4.0.

Fix is to recognize both names at the client side in both 3.3 and 4.0. Only
difference is to check for the datacollection name of 3.3 first if the client is
3.3 and check for name of 4.0 first if client is 4.0.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
